subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=61|rad=心|as=05|sn=8|four=|canj=PKR|ids=⿰[[忄]][[右]]}}

# (non-classical form of [[憂]]) [[palpitation]] or [[flutter]]ing of the [[heart]]
# to [[become]] [[interested]] in [[something]] (usually as a result of [[persuasion]])
# to [[move]] the [[mind]], to [[start]] [[think]]ing
# [[agitate]]d, [[nervous]]
